description: This solicitation is for the purchase of F5 support and maintenance renewal. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to submit a response to a solicitation. The solicitation covers F5 support and maintenance renewal. The contract duration is one year.
full_summary:
### F5 Renewal for RCMP Solicitation

#### Solicitation Overview

*   **Reference #**: SSC-23-00023776
*   **Solicitation #**: BPM019526/23776
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-24T14:00:00

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Solicitation Description

This solicitation is for the renewal of F5 support and maintenance. Relevant documentation can be accessed by registering at the SSC P2P portal. Successful bidders will be selected through a competitive bidding process and will be expected to provide F5 support and maintenance in accordance with the technical specifications.

#### Point of Contact

*   **Name:** Clara Whittaker
*   **Email:** clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** 343-553-8354
*   **Fax:** 343-553-8354
*   **Address:** 180 Kent, Ottawa

#### Attachment

*   [Download Solicitation Package](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/88105300-5594-4DAE-B11A-2B59ECEB7984)

Note:
No revisions have been made to the original information, only the format and language have been adjusted for clarity. Review the entire text for errors or required changes. Kindly let me know if you require any further assistance.
